segments.text: From where I'm standing, the kitchen looks ordinary at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Sunlight filters through the window, highlighting the garden path outside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the faucet running, sink full and overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water sheets down the front, puddling on the tile floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman in the apron is polishing a dish, unaware completely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's stepping in the wet spot, risking a slip any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's on a two-step stool, reaching high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool wobbles; I hold my breath watching him.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand's in the cookie jar, pulling out treats.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl beside him has her arm extended, palm up.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're collaborating in secret, eyes on the prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The contrast with the peaceful yard view is striking.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the boy will fall right into the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears or worse.
segments.speaker: PAR
